text: My nisposlali im Yasnuyu Knigu, v kotoroy yest' dokazatel'stva togo, chto Allakh Yedin, i ukazyvayetsya na znameniya Allakha vo Vselennoy. V ney - Yego shariat, pryamoy put' k istine, i nastavleniye na etot pryamoy put' - vso to, chto voploshchayet miloserdiye Allakha lyudyam, sleduyushchim Yego putom. V etoy Knige nakhodyat pol'zu tol'ko te, kotoryye uverovali i poklonyayutsya Allakhu, povinuyas' Yego Istine
